Zia served as prime minister for three terms and was known for her longstanding rivalry with Sheikh Hasina. The government has declared three days of state mourning, and her funeral is scheduled for Wednesday.

title: China holds biggest military drills near Taiwan in years
snippets: Day two of the 'Justice Mission 2025' drills will include 10 hours of live-fire exercises and a simulated blockade.

title: Raptors Warriors Trail Blazers and Heat win NBA games
snippets: Jamal Shead scored a career-high 19 points off the bench as the Toronto Raptors rallied past the Orlando Magic 107-106 on Monday.
Jamal Shead poured in 19 points off the bench and Scottie Barnes double-doubled with 13 points and 11 rebounds as the Toronto Raptors earned a comeback win over the Orlando Magic, 107-106.
Steph Curry led the way with 27 points, one of six Golden State Warriors to tally double figures in their 120-107 win over the Brooklyn Nets.
Deni Avdija scored 27 points and dropped 11 assists to lead the Portland Trail Blazers to a 125-122 win over the Dallas Mavericks.

Shai Gilgeous-Alexander dropped 39 points, Chet Holmgren added 24 points with 9 rebounds and 3 blocks, Jalen Williams notched 20 points and 9 boards, as the Oklahoma City Thunder outgunned the Atlanta Hawks 140-129 despite 25 threes from Atlanta.

Norman Powell led the way with 25 points and Jaime Jaquez Jr. tallied 20 points and 11 assists as the Miami Heat dominated the Denver Nuggets 147-123 in a game that saw Nikola Jokic leave with an injury.
Jalen Brunson posted 28 points and 10 assists, and OG Anunoby added 23 points as the New York Knicks held on late to defeat the New Orleans Pelicans 130-125.
Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 24 points in 25 minutes to help lead the Milwaukee Bucks to a 123-113 win over the Charlotte Hornets.
Naz Reid posted a game-high 33 points, and Julius Randle put up 17 points and 14 assists as the Minnesota Timberwolves crushed the Chicago Bulls 136-101.
Collin Gillespie scored 25 points and added six assists as the Phoenix Suns defeated the Washington Wizards 115-101.
Kevin Durant put up 30 points, and Jabari Smith Jr. chipped in with 21 points and 10 rebounds as the Houston Rockets defeated the Indiana Pacers 126-119.
Jarrett Allen led the way on offence with 27 points and 10 rebounds, and Darius Garland chipped in with 15 points and 11 assists as the Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the San Antonio Spurs 113-101.
titles: Shead’s career-best game lifts Raptors to win

summary: Jamal Shead scored a career-high 19 points off the bench as the Toronto Raptors edged the Orlando Magic 107-106. Steph Curry led the Golden State Warriors with 27 points in a 120-107 win over the Brooklyn Nets. Deni Avdija had 27 points and 11 assists in the Portland Trail Blazers' 125-122 victory over the Dallas Mavericks. The Miami Heat beat the Denver Nuggets 147-123, with Nikola Jokic leaving due to injury. Other NBA winners included the Knicks, Bucks, Timberwolves, Suns, Rockets, and Cavaliers.
